Las Vegas Data Innovation Festival, July 17-18

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Big Data, Business Analytics, IE Group, Innovation, Las Vegas

Why should be in Vegas? Network with other professionals, learn at 50+ technical sessions, talk to speakers and top experts, and enjoy the city!




Are you ready to take your knowledge and career to the next level?

Learn from Joanna Wong, Head of Business Marketing for Asia at Spotify in her presentation "How Big Data Drives Digital Marketing Success".

Hungry for more? Join data leaders from Capital One, PepsiCo, NestlÃ©, Bank of America, Groupon, Viacom, NYSE, MGM Resorts at the Las Vegas Data Innovation Festival 2018 July 17 & 18! 

5 reasons why you should be in Vegas:
  • The People: with 20+ hours dedicated to networking opportunities, you'll have plenty of time to meet future business partners among the 300+ data professionals in attendance
  • The Content: our agendas include 50+ sessions that will help you modernize your outdated processes while realizing the importance of disruptive innovation to establish an agile data management
  • The Speakers: when was the last time you spoke with the Head of Analytics at NestlÃ©? This is your chance to meet industry leaders and ask them your burning questions
  • The City: the summits are taking place in one of the most dynamic cities in the United States. Why not make it a team building trip? Access our exclusive deals at Bally's Las Vegas
  • The Timing: a business trip to Vegas is exactly what you and your team need to bond over summer 
Get Your Pass


For more information, contact Victor Hernandez, Global Event manager.
